title: 301 - SuperNova
description: We’re all mad about scooters, Dan gives an audience member a backpack and makes a new friend, then Spencer debuts his new role playing grading system. Featuring Dan Harmon, Jeff Bryan Davis, Spencer Crittenden and Rob Schrab.
